alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Showers with gusty winds will impact portions of western Arapahoe, Denver and western Adams Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 443 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty outflow winds from weak showers along a line extending from near Todd Creek to 3 miles south of Commerce City to 4 miles north of Greenwood Village. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Denver, Aurora, Thornton, northeastern Centennial, Commerce City, Northglenn, Brighton, Englewood, Greenwood Village, Federal Heights, Denver International Airport, D.I.A Terminal and Concourses, Sheridan, Bennett, Manila Village, Arapahoe Park, Watkins and Buckley SFB. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
